description: Test parasite attachment mechanics: ATTACH/DETACH actions, passive drain, position sync, trait-based detection

customAgents.note: Parasites - test attachment/detachment, passive drain, host-hopping
Herbivore hosts - potential targets for parasites

primary: Verify ATTACH action works (parasites attach to hosts within 5 pixels)
Verify DETACH action works (parasites voluntarily leave hosts)
Confirm passive drain (host loses 2 energy/tick, parasite gains 1.5 energy/tick)
Validate position synchronization (parasite moves with host)
Test auto-detach on host death (parasite survives)
secondary: Test reproduction while detached (cannot reproduce while attached)
Validate vulnerability when detached (low speed disadvantage)
Check emergency plant eating (detached parasites can eat plants)
